input_text:
Job Title: Medical Devices (Manufacturing Sector) - SME

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Manufacturing, Product Management

Description:
Net2Source Inc. is an award-winning total workforce solutions company recognized by Staffing Industry Analysts for our accelerated growth of 300% in the last 3 years with over 5500+ employees globally, with over 30+ locations in the US and global operations in 32 countries. We believe in providing staffing solutions to address the current talent gap – Right Talent – Right Time – Right Place – Right Price and acting as a Career Coach to our consultants.
Please find below the job description.
Position: Medical Devices (Manufacturing Sector) - SMELocation: 100% REMOTEType: Full Time Employment
Job Summary:Intelligent IoT enabled operations within production facilities and distribution networks have started resulting in the proliferation of data and have started experiencing rapid improvements in operations. To be successful, companies will need to leverage IoT capabilities at scale design systems that increase connections between people, OT systems, IT applications and processes interconnecting them all. Roles & Responsibilities:Hold the responsibility of defining Service offerings for Medical Devices sector as a sub offering of Company Intelligent Operations portfolio.Responsible for coming up with Offering strategy aligning to market trend customer need and practice strategy.As a Subject Matter Expert SME, work closely with Sales team, Client stakeholders and ecosystem partners to define roadmap for offering services.Elevate Company's position in the industry as an established thought leader and as a partner of choice for clients to help them define a smart manufacturing transformation strategy identify key success factors define what good should look like and develop a programmatic approach for execution.Collaborate with partners and alliances team to bundle partner products solutions as part of the offering and help clients in determining best fit platforms and solutions.Enable Sales team on the offering capability and product roadmap.Support Marketing team in packaging the offering for internal and external consumption.Work closely with delivery team to identify opportunities develop capabilities and drive market insertion
Responsibilities:Industry Expert for Med Device sector with working knowledge in Manufacturing sectorSetting the vision and strategy to drive offering roadmap.Driving results for the business across total contract value TCV and revenue goals.Contributing to the IoT Business operations.Business transformation advisor for key clients.Lead offering lifecycle management.Provide input on strategic alliances partnerships.Generate thought leadership and engage with customers.Manage analyst and intermediary relations.Help design and support execution of marketing activities.Advise on market pricing and GTM strategy.Build offering business case and determine investment requirements.Collaborate with sales team to identify qualify and meet clients.Guide delivery teams to architect and design solutions on client engagements.

If you are interested, please forward your resume to Amir@Net2Source.com, You can also reach me at (+1-201-354-1049).
Why work with us - At Net2Source, we believe everyone has an opportunity to lead. We see the importance of your perspective and your ability to create value. We want you to fit in—with an inclusive culture, focus on work-life fit and well-being, and a supportive, connected environment; but we also want you to stand out—with opportunities to have a strategic impact, innovate, and take necessary steps to make your mark. We help clients with new skilling, talent strategy, leadership development, employee experience, transformational change management and beyond.
Equal Employment Opportunity Statement:Net2Source is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative, more competitive, and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.
Awards and Accolades:America's Most Honored Businesses (Top 10%)Awarded by USPAAC for Fastest Growing Business in the US12th Fastest Growing Staffing Company in USA by Staffing industry Analysts in the US (2020, 2019, 2020)Fastest 50 by NJ Biz (2020, 2019, 2020)INC 5000 Fastest growing for 8 consecutive years in a row (only 1.26% companies make it to this list)Top 100 by Dallas Business Journal (2020 and 2019)Proven Supplier of the Year by Workforce Logiq (2020 and 2019)2019 Spirit of Alliance Award by Agile12018 Best of the Best Platinum Award by Agile12018 TechServe Alliance Excellence Awards Winner2017 Best of the Best Gold Award by Agile1(Act1 Group)

Regards,
Amir AhmadAccount ManagerNet2Source Inc.Global HQ Address – 270 Davidson Ave, Suite 704, Somerset, NJ 08873, USAOffice: (201) 340-8700 x 428 (EXT )| Cell: +1-201-354-1049 | Fax: (201) 221-8131| Email: amir@net2source.comWeb: www.net2source.com | Social: Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn

Experience Level (if available): Director
